data.title: Man on the Moon | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase Man on the Moon on digital and stream instantly or download offline. Based on a true story, Jim Carrey stunningly portrays the late Andy Kaufman - considered the most innovative, eccentric and enigmatic comic of his time - in Man on the Moon. "Jim Carrey is extraordinary" says The New York Post. "Jim Carrey may be a better Andy Kaufman than Andy Kaufman" writes Newsweek. Also starring Danny DeVito as Kaufman's manager, Courtney Love as the woman Andy falls in love with and Paul Giamatti as his best friend. You'll stand up and cheer for Carrey in one of the year's most entertaining movies!
data.text:
Besides a clever script, deft direction, and Carrey literally carrying the film to incredible heights, Forman was able to assemble a host of actors playing themselves, including most of the original "Taxi" cast members...

March 2, 2022

I really do feel Jim Carey deserved at least an Oscar nomination for his performance...Man on the Moon is fascinating, really well acted and really well directed.

January 22, 2018

The main problem with this film though is the running time -- it's too short.

August 15, 2017

Ends up asking more questions than it answers.

June 21, 2017

We're constantly kept guessing as to what's real or false. Intriguing.

June 21, 2017
